verses.name: Job 9:30
verses.text: If I wash myself with snow water, and make my hands never so clean;

verses.name: Job 9:31
verses.text: Yet shalt thou plunge me in the ditch, and mine own clothes shall abhor me.

verses.name: Job 9:32
verses.text: For he is not a man, as I am, that I should answer him, and we should come together in judgment.

verses.name: Job 9:33
verses.text: Neither is there any daysman betwixt us, that might lay his hand upon us both.

verses.name: Job 9:34
verses.text: Let him take his rod away from me, and let not his fear terrify me:

verses.name: Job 9:35
verses.text: Then would I speak, and not fear him; but it is not so with me.
